review: I'm still learning what this can offer, but so far I'm very pleased with it. It doesn't seem to require too much bandwidth to stream a good picture. The packaging was very nice and initial setup pretty easy. I've signed up for Sling TV and have used Pandora multiple times. One of the big draws for me was Amazon Prime Video streaming, but I really haven't used it yet. I have streamed some music from Amazon, which worked well. Remote integration so both the TV and Fire Stick could be controlled from one device would be a great addition.
